summary: Contains 3 bat files for all alchemy, crafting and soulgems
descriptionHtml:
This file simply contains three bat files:
- alchemy
- crafting
- soulgem

Install:
- use NMM  or
- manually extract crafting, alchemy & soulgem files to your Skyrim/Data folder

Uninstall:
- use NMM  or
- manually remove crafting, alchemy & soulgem files from your Skyrim/Data folder

These files are handy for use near a central crafting/enchanting/alchemy area or with centralized storage.

To run the bat file:
- type the Tilde key ~  (between Esc and Tab)
- type bat crafting   or   bat alchemy   or   bat soulgem
- enter

For how many of what please see the readme.

v1.1 - corrected bad item code on quicksilver ingots

Also uploaded an optional spreadsheet to automate the making of bat files; xls format
author: scrapperrm
